name: azure-devops-workitem-creator
description: Create Azure DevOps work items directly from code selections in VS Code

steps.description:
Learn what this extension does and how it can help you track technical debt and bugs.

steps.description:
Authenticate with your Microsoft account to access Azure DevOps.
[Sign In Now](command:quickAdoWi.signIn)

steps.title: Configure Your Organization and Project
steps.description:
Set up your Azure DevOps organization and project.
[Configure Now](command:quickAdoWi.configure)

steps.title: Create a Work Item from Code
steps.description:
Creating a work item requires an active editor and a selection (walkthroughs don't guarantee either).

1) [Open a new file](command:workbench.action.files.newUntitledFile)
2) Paste/select a few lines
3) [Create Work Item](command:quickAdoWi.createWorkItem)
